string.name: name
string.value: The Mystery of the Green Portion
#b#@1032104:##k in #bEllinia#k says she may know a way to reveal the portion of the #rDirty Treasure Map#k that has been covered. Let's go find her.

#b#@1032104:##k in #bEllinia#k says she'll reveal the green portion of the map if you hunt #rSlimes#k and collect #rSquishy Liquids#k. Although #rSlimes#k are found everywhere, a great number of them can be found in #b#m101010000##k.\n\nReport back to #b#@1032104:##k in #bEllinia#k upon completion.
#b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k says he may know of a way to unveil the rest of the map. Let's talk to him.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1500 #Wbasic# #i4032486:# #t4032486:# #c4032486# 1 Able to proceed to 'Grendel the Really Tipsy' as next quest.

What, are you infatuated with my beauty? Wait, you're not?
Sorry, haha!

But what is this dirty piece of paper? Green, red, white...it's filled with different colors. This is a Treasure Map...? If that's true, I may be able to help you out a bit.
Please hunt #rSlimes#k and bring me 20 #rSquishy Liquids#k. I'll help you remove the green on the map then. #rSlimes#k can be found everywhere, but they can be very easily found in #b#m101010000##k.
Ha, funny. You don't want my help?
Thank you for bringing them to me. Please hand them over to me carefully so you don't pop them.\n\nJust give me a few seconds and I'll make you something for you.

Ta-da! This is called the #rGreen Slime Eraser#k. Cute, huh?

You'll be able to remove the green on the map using this eraser.
(Open the #rDirty Treasure Map#k and drag and place the #rGreen Slime Eraser#k above the map.)
I'm not sure what to do about the red portion of the map.\nYou should ask #b#p1032001##k in #bEllinia#k. He has a lot of experience with just about everything.
